SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO document(doc_title, doc_writer_no, doc_content, doc_type, approval_status, doc_purpose, doc_price, doc_remarks, vacation_type, vacation_backup, material_name, material_quantity, resignation_type, start_date, end_date) VALUES(#{docTitle}, #{docWriterNo}, #{docContent}, #{docType}, #{approvalStatus}, #{docPurpose}, #{docPrice}, #{docRemarks}, #{vacationType}, #{vacationBackup}, #{materialName}, #{materialQuantity}, #{resignationType}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: SELECT d.dept_code deptCode, d.dept_name deptName, dv.division_code divisionCode, dv.division_name divisionName FROM employee e INNER JOIN department d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code INNER JOIN division dv ON d.division_code = dv.division_code WHERE e.emp_no = #{empNo}
SELECT division_code divisionCode, division_name divisionName FROM division ORDER BY divisionName;
SELECT dept_code deptCode, division_code divisionCode, dept_name deptName FROM department WHERE division_code = #{divisionCode} ORDER BY deptName

SELECT e.emp_no empNo, e.emp_name empName, e.dept_code deptCode, de.dept_name deptName, di.division_name divisionName, r.rank_name rankName FROM employee e INNER JOIN `rank` r ON e.rank_no = r.rank_no INNER JOIN department de ON e.dept_code = de.dept_code INNER JOIN division di ON de.division_code = di.division_code WHERE e.dept_code = #{deptCode} ORDER BY e.rank_no ASC, e.emp_name ASC

SELECT e.emp_no empNo, e.emp_name empName, e.dept_code deptCode, de.dept_name deptName, di.division_name divisionName, r.rank_name rankName FROM employee e INNER JOIN `rank` r ON e.rank_no = r.rank_no INNER JOIN department de ON e.dept_code = de.dept_code INNER JOIN division di ON de.division_code = di.division_code WHERE e.emp_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{empName}, '%') ORDER BY e.rank_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE document SET doc_bin = CASE WHEN doc_bin = '0' THEN '1' WHEN doc_bin = '1' THEN '0' END WHERE doc_no = #{docNo};
mapper.select: SELECT d.doc_no docNo, d.doc_type docType, d.doc_writer_no docWriterNo, e1.emp_name docWriterName, de.dept_name docWriterDept, d.create_datetime createDatetime, d.approval_status approvalStatus, d.doc_title docTitle, d.doc_content docContent, d.doc_remarks docRemarks, e2.emp_name initApproverName, e3.emp_name midApproverName, e4.emp_name finalApproverName, da.doc_approvers_no docApproversNo, da.init_approver_no initApproverNo, da.init_approval_status initApprovalStatus, da.init_approval_datetime initApprovalDatetime, da.init_reject_reason initRejectReason, da.mid_approver_no midApproverNo, da.mid_approval_status midApprovalStatus, da.mid_approval_datetime midApprovalDatetime, da.mid_reject_reason midRejectReason, da.final_approver_no finalApproverNo, da.final_approval_status finalApprovalStatus, da.final_approval_datetime finalApprovalDatetime, da.final_reject_reason finalRejectReason FROM document d INNER JOIN employee e1 ON e1.emp_no = d.doc_writer_no INNER JOIN department de ON e1.dept_code = de.dept_code INNER JOIN document_approvers da ON d.doc_no = da.doc_no INNER JOIN employee e2 ON e2.emp_no = da.init_approver_no INNER JOIN employee e3 ON e3.emp_no = da.mid_approver_no INNER JOIN employee e4 ON e4.emp_no = da.final_approver_no WHERE d.doc_no = #{docNo}
mapper.update:
UPDATE document_approvers da INNER JOIN document d ON d.doc_no = da.doc_no
da.init_approval_status = 'A', da.init_approval_datetime = NOW()
da.mid_approval_status = 'A', da.mid_approval_datetime = NOW()
da.final_approval_status = 'A', da.final_approval_datetime = NOW(), d.approval_status = 'A'
WHERE doc_approvers_no = #{docApproversNo}

UPDATE document_approvers da INNER JOIN document d ON d.doc_no = da.doc_no
da.init_approval_status = 'R', da.init_approval_datetime = NOW(), da.init_reject_reason = #{initRejectReason}, d.approval_status = 'R'
da.mid_approval_status = 'R', da.mid_approval_datetime = NOW(), da.mid_reject_reason = #{midRejectReason}, d.approval_status = 'R'
da.final_approval_status = 'R', da.final_approval_datetime = NOW(), da.final_reject_reason = #{finalRejectReason}, d.approval_status = 'R'
WHERE da.doc_approvers_no = #{docApproversNo}
